00027 BOOLEAN fValidCursor = FALSE;
00028 BOOLEAN fAnchored =     FALSE;
00029 BOOLEAN gfBrushEnabled = TRUE;
00030 UINT16 gusSelectionWidth = 1, gusPreserveSelectionWidth = 1;
00031 UINT16 gusSelectionType = SMALLSELECTION;
00032 UINT16 gusSelectionDensity = 2;
00033 UINT16 gusSavedSelectionType = SMALLSELECTION;
00034 UINT16 gusSavedBuildingSelectionType = AREASELECTION;
00035 extern INT16 sGridX; // symbol already declared globally in editscreen.cpp (jonathanl)
00036 extern INT16 sGridY; // symbol already declared globally in editscreen.cpp (jonathanl)
00037 INT16 sBadMarker = -1;
00038 
00039 UINT16 *wszSelType[6]= { L"Small", L"Medium", L"Large", L"XLarge", L"Width: xx", L"Area" };

00042 BOOLEAN gfCurrentSelectionWithRightButton = FALSE;

00052 //Used for offseting cursor to show that it is on the roof rather than on the ground.
00053 //This can be conveniently executed by moving the cursor up and right 3 gridnos for a
00054 //total of -483  -(160*3)-(1*3)
00055 #define ROOF_OFFSET           (-483)
00056 BOOLEAN gfUsingOffset;
00057 
00058 //Based on the density level setting and the selection type, this test will
00059 //randomly choose TRUE or FALSE to reflect the *odds*.
00060 BOOLEAN PerformDensityTest()
00061 {
00062       if( Random(100) < gusSelectionDensity )
00063             return TRUE;
00064       return FALSE;
00065 }
00066 
00067 void IncreaseSelectionDensity()
00068 {
00069       if( gusSelectionDensity == 100 )
00070             gusSelectionDensity = 2;
00071       else if( gusSelectionDensity == 2 )
00072             gusSelectionDensity = 5;
00073       else if( gusSelectionDensity == 5 )
00074             gusSelectionDensity = 10;
00075       else
00076             gusSelectionDensity += 10;
00077 }
00078 
00079 void DecreaseSelectionDensity()
00080 {
00081       if( gusSelectionDensity == 10 )
00082             gusSelectionDensity = 5;
00083       else if( gusSelectionDensity == 5 )
00084             gusSelectionDensity = 2;
00085       else if( gusSelectionDensity == 2 )
00086             gusSelectionDensity = 100;
00087       else
00088             gusSelectionDensity -= 10;
00089 }
00090 
00091 void RemoveCursors()
00092 {
00093       INT32 x, y, iMapIndex;
00094       if( gpBuildingLayoutList )
00095       {
00096             RemoveBuildingLayout();
00097       }
00098       Assert( gSelectRegion.iTop >= 0 && gSelectRegion.iTop <= gSelectRegion.iBottom );
00099       Assert( gSelectRegion.iLeft >= 0 && gSelectRegion.iLeft <= gSelectRegion.iRight );
00100       for( y = gSelectRegion.iTop; y <= gSelectRegion.iBottom; y++ )
00101       {     
00102             for( x = gSelectRegion.iLeft; x <= gSelectRegion.iRight; x++ )
00103             {
00104                   LEVELNODE* pNode;
00105                   iMapIndex = y * WORLD_COLS + x;
00106                   if( gfUsingOffset )
00107                         iMapIndex += ROOF_OFFSET;
00108                   pNode = gpWorldLevelData[ iMapIndex ].pTopmostHead;
00109                   while( pNode )
00110                   {
00111                         if( pNode->usIndex == FIRSTPOINTERS1 || pNode->usIndex == FIRSTPOINTERS5 )
00112                         {
00113                               RemoveTopmost( iMapIndex, pNode->usIndex );
00114                               break;
00115                         }
00116                         pNode = pNode->pNext;
00117                   }
00118             }
00119       }
00120       fValidCursor = FALSE;
00121       gfUsingOffset = FALSE;
00122 }
00123 
00124 void RemoveBadMarker()
00125 {
00126       LEVELNODE *pNode;
00127       if( sBadMarker < 0 )
00128             return;
00129       pNode = gpWorldLevelData[ sBadMarker ].pTopmostHead;
00130       while( pNode )
00131       {
00132             if( pNode->usIndex == BADMARKER1 )
00133             {
00134                   RemoveTopmost( sBadMarker, pNode->usIndex );
00135                   sBadMarker = -1;
00136                   break;
00137             }
00138             pNode = pNode->pNext;
00139       }
00140 }
00141 
00142 void UpdateCursorAreas()
00143 {
00144       INT32 x, y, iMapIndex;
00145 
00146       RemoveCursors();
00147 
00148       EnsureSelectionType();
00149 
00150       //Determine if the mouse is currently in the world.
00151       if( gViewportRegion.uiFlags & MSYS_MOUSE_IN_AREA && GetMouseXY( &sGridX, &sGridY ) )
00152       {
00153             iMapIndex = MAPROWCOLTOPOS( sGridY, sGridX );
00154             if( gpBuildingLayoutList )
00155             {
00156                   gSelectRegion.iLeft = gSelectRegion.iRight = sGridX;
00157                   gSelectRegion.iTop = gSelectRegion.iBottom = sGridY;
00158                   fValidCursor = TRUE;
00159                   DrawBuildingLayout( iMapIndex );
00160             }
00161             else switch( gusSelectionType )
00162             {
00163                   case SMALLSELECTION: 
00164                         gSelectRegion.iLeft = gSelectRegion.iRight = sGridX;
00165                         gSelectRegion.iTop = gSelectRegion.iBottom = sGridY;
00166                         fValidCursor = TRUE;
00167                         break;
00168                   case MEDIUMSELECTION: 
00169                   case LARGESELECTION:  
00170                   case XLARGESELECTION: 
00171                         //The mouse mode value reflects the size of the cursor.
00172                         gSelectRegion.iTop = sGridY - gusSelectionType;
00173                         gSelectRegion.iBottom = sGridY + gusSelectionType;
00174                         gSelectRegion.iLeft = sGridX - gusSelectionType;
00175                         gSelectRegion.iRight = sGridX + gusSelectionType;
00176                         ValidateSelectionRegionBoundaries();
00177                         fValidCursor = TRUE;
00178                         break;
00179                   case LINESELECTION:
00180                         fValidCursor = HandleAreaSelection();
00181                         ForceAreaSelectionWidth();
00182                         ValidateSelectionRegionBoundaries();
00183                         break;
00184                   case AREASELECTION:
00185                         fValidCursor = HandleAreaSelection();
00186                         break;
00187             }
00188       }
00189       //Draw all of the area cursors here.
00190       if( fValidCursor )
00191       {
00192             if( iDrawMode == DRAW_MODE_ENEMY || iDrawMode == DRAW_MODE_CREATURE || 
00193                         iDrawMode == DRAW_MODE_REBEL || iDrawMode == DRAW_MODE_CIVILIAN ||
00194                         iDrawMode == DRAW_MODE_SCHEDULEACTION )
00195             {
00196                   iMapIndex = gSelectRegion.iTop * WORLD_COLS + gSelectRegion.iLeft;
00197                   if( !IsLocationSittable( iMapIndex, gfRoofPlacement ) && iDrawMode != DRAW_MODE_SCHEDULEACTION || 
00198                           !IsLocationSittableExcludingPeople( iMapIndex, gfRoofPlacement ) && iDrawMode == DRAW_MODE_SCHEDULEACTION )
00199                   {
00200                         if( sBadMarker != iMapIndex )
00201                         {
00202                               RemoveBadMarker();
00203                               if( gfRoofPlacement && FlatRoofAboveGridNo( iMapIndex ) )
00204                               {
00205                                     AddTopmostToTail( iMapIndex + ROOF_OFFSET, BADMARKER1 );
00206                                     sBadMarker = (INT16)(iMapIndex + ROOF_OFFSET );
00207                               }
00208                               else
00209                               {
00210                                     AddTopmostToTail( (iMapIndex), BADMARKER1 );
00211                                     sBadMarker = (INT16)(iMapIndex);
00212                               }
00213                         }
00214                   }
00215                   else
00216                   {
00217                         RemoveBadMarker();
00218                         if( gfRoofPlacement && FlatRoofAboveGridNo( iMapIndex ) )
00219                         {
00220                               AddTopmostToTail( iMapIndex + ROOF_OFFSET, FIRSTPOINTERS5 );
00221                               gfUsingOffset = TRUE;
00222                         }
00223                         else
00224                               AddTopmostToTail( iMapIndex, FIRSTPOINTERS1 );
00225                   }
00226             }
00227             else for( y = gSelectRegion.iTop; y <= gSelectRegion.iBottom; y++ )
00228             {     
00229                   for( x = gSelectRegion.iLeft; x <= gSelectRegion.iRight; x++ )
00230                   {
00231                         iMapIndex = y * WORLD_COLS + x;
00232                         AddTopmostToTail( iMapIndex, FIRSTPOINTERS1 );
00233                   }
00234             }
00235       }
00236 }
00237 
00238 void ForceAreaSelectionWidth()
00239 {
00240       UINT16 gusDecSelWidth;
00241       
00242       //If the anchor isn't set, we don't want to force the size yet.
00243       if( !fAnchored )
00244             return;
00245       
00246       gusDecSelWidth = gusSelectionWidth - 1;
00247 
00248       //compare the region with the anchor and determine if we are going to force size via
00249       //height or width depending on the cursor distance from the anchor.
00250       if( abs( sGridX - gSelectAnchor.iX ) < abs( sGridY - gSelectAnchor.iY ) )
00251       { //restrict the x axis
00252             if( sGridX < gSelectAnchor.iX )
00253             { //to the left
00254                   gSelectRegion.iLeft = gSelectAnchor.iX - gusDecSelWidth;
00255                   gSelectRegion.iRight = gSelectAnchor.iX;
00256             }
00257             else
00258             { //to the right
00259                   gSelectRegion.iLeft = gSelectAnchor.iX;
00260                   gSelectRegion.iRight = gSelectAnchor.iX + gusDecSelWidth;
00261             }
00262       }
00263       else
00264       { //restrict the y axis
00265             if( sGridY < gSelectAnchor.iY )
00266             {     //to the upper
00267                   gSelectRegion.iTop = gSelectAnchor.iY - gusDecSelWidth;
00268                   gSelectRegion.iBottom = gSelectAnchor.iY;
00269             }
00270             else
00271             { //to the lower
00272                   gSelectRegion.iBottom = gSelectAnchor.iY + gusDecSelWidth;
00273                   gSelectRegion.iTop = gSelectAnchor.iY;
00274             }
00275       }
00276 }
00277 
00278 BOOLEAN HandleAreaSelection()
00279 {
00280       //When the user releases the left button, then clear and process the area.
00281       if( fAnchored )
00282       {
00283             if( !gfLeftButtonState  && !gfCurrentSelectionWithRightButton || 
00284                     !gfRightButtonState &&  gfCurrentSelectionWithRightButton )
00285             {
00286                   fAnchored = FALSE;
00287                   ProcessAreaSelection( (BOOLEAN)!gfCurrentSelectionWithRightButton );
00288                   gfCurrentSelectionWithRightButton = FALSE;
00289                   return FALSE;
00290             }
00291       }
00292       //When the user first clicks, anchor the area.
00293       if( !fAnchored )
00294       {
00295             if( gfLeftButtonState || gfRightButtonState && gfAllowRightButtonSelections )
00296             {
00297                   if( gfRightButtonState && !gfLeftButtonState )
00298                         gfCurrentSelectionWithRightButton = TRUE;
00299                   else
00300                         gfCurrentSelectionWithRightButton = FALSE;
00301                   fAnchored = TRUE;
00302                   gSelectAnchor.iX = sGridX;
00303                   gSelectAnchor.iY = sGridY;
00304                   gSelectRegion.iLeft = gSelectRegion.iRight = sGridX;
00305                   gSelectRegion.iTop = gSelectRegion.iBottom = sGridY;
00306                   return TRUE;
00307             }
00308       }
00309       //If no anchoring, then we are really dealing with a single cursor,
00310       //until the user clicks and holds the mouse button to anchor the cursor.
00311       if( !fAnchored )
00312       {
00313             gSelectRegion.iLeft = gSelectRegion.iRight = sGridX;
00314             gSelectRegion.iTop = gSelectRegion.iBottom = sGridY;
00315             return TRUE;
00316       }
00317       //Base the area from the anchor to the current mouse position.
00318       if ( sGridX <= gSelectAnchor.iX )
00319       {
00320             gSelectRegion.iLeft = sGridX;
00321             gSelectRegion.iRight = gSelectAnchor.iX;
00322       }
00323       else
00324       {
00325             gSelectRegion.iRight = sGridX;
00326             gSelectRegion.iLeft = gSelectAnchor.iX;
00327       }
00328       if ( sGridY <= gSelectAnchor.iY )
00329       {
00330             gSelectRegion.iTop = sGridY;
00331             gSelectRegion.iBottom = gSelectAnchor.iY;
00332       }
00333       else
00334       {
00335             gSelectRegion.iBottom = sGridY;
00336             gSelectRegion.iTop = gSelectAnchor.iY;
00337       }
00338       return TRUE;
00339 }
00340 
00341 void ValidateSelectionRegionBoundaries()
00342 {
00343       gSelectRegion.iLeft           = max( min( 159, gSelectRegion.iLeft       ), 0 );
00344       gSelectRegion.iRight    = max( min( 159, gSelectRegion.iRight  ), 0 );
00345       gSelectRegion.iTop            = max( min( 159, gSelectRegion.iTop        ), 0 );
00346       gSelectRegion.iBottom = max( min( 159, gSelectRegion.iBottom ), 0 );
00347 }
00348 
00349 void EnsureSelectionType()
00350 {
00351       BOOLEAN fPrevBrushEnabledState = gfBrushEnabled;
00352 
00353       //At time of writing, the only drawing mode supporting right mouse button 
00354       //area selections is the cave drawing mode.
00355       gfAllowRightButtonSelections = ( iDrawMode == DRAW_MODE_CAVES );
00356       
00357       //if we are erasing, we have more flexibility with the drawing modes.
00358       if( iDrawMode >= DRAW_MODE_ERASE )
00359       {
00360             //erase modes supporting any cursor mode
00361             gusSavedSelectionType = gusSelectionType;
00362             gusSelectionWidth = gusPreserveSelectionWidth;
00363             gfBrushEnabled = TRUE;
00364       }
00365       else switch( iDrawMode )
00366       { //regular modes
00367             case DRAW_MODE_SAW_ROOM:
00368             case DRAW_MODE_ROOM:
00369             case DRAW_MODE_CAVES:
00370                   gusSavedBuildingSelectionType = gusSelectionType;
00371                   gusSelectionWidth = gusPreserveSelectionWidth;
00372                   gfBrushEnabled = TRUE;
00373                   break;
00374             case DRAW_MODE_SLANTED_ROOF:
00375                   gusSelectionType = LINESELECTION;
00376                   gusSelectionWidth = 8;
00377                   gfBrushEnabled = FALSE;
00378                   break;
00379             case DRAW_MODE_EXITGRID:
00380             case DRAW_MODE_ROOMNUM:
00381             case DRAW_MODE_FLOORS:
00382             case DRAW_MODE_GROUND:
00383             case DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS:
00384             case DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS1:
00385             case DRAW_MODE_OSTRUCTS2:
00386             case DRAW_MODE_DEBRIS:
00387                   //supports all modes
00388                   gusSavedSelectionType = gusSelectionType;
00389                   gusSelectionWidth = gusPreserveSelectionWidth;
00390                   gfBrushEnabled = TRUE;
00391                   break;
00392             default:
00393                   gusSelectionType = SMALLSELECTION;
00394                   gusSelectionWidth = gusPreserveSelectionWidth;
00395                   gfBrushEnabled = FALSE;
00396                   break;
00397       }
00398 
00399       if( gfBrushEnabled != fPrevBrushEnabledState )
00400       {
00401             if( gfBrushEnabled )
00402             {
00403                   EnableEditorButton( TERRAIN_CYCLE_BRUSHSIZE );
00404                   EnableEditorButton( BUILDING_CYCLE_BRUSHSIZE );
00405                   EnableEditorButton( MAPINFO_CYCLE_BRUSHSIZE );
00406             }
00407             else
00408             {
00409                   DisableEditorButton( TERRAIN_CYCLE_BRUSHSIZE );
00410                   DisableEditorButton( BUILDING_CYCLE_BRUSHSIZE );
00411                   DisableEditorButton( MAPINFO_CYCLE_BRUSHSIZE );
00412             }
00413       }
00414 }
00415 
00416 void DrawBuildingLayout( INT32 iMapIndex )
00417 {
00418       BUILDINGLAYOUTNODE *curr;
00419       INT32 iOffset;
00420       LEVELNODE* pNode;
00421       BOOLEAN fAdd;
00422       iOffset = iMapIndex - gsBuildingLayoutAnchorGridNo;
00423       curr = gpBuildingLayoutList;
00424       while( curr )
00425       {
00426             iMapIndex = curr->sGridNo + iOffset;
00427             if( iMapIndex > 0 && iMapIndex < WORLD_MAX )
00428             {
00429                   fAdd = TRUE;
00430                   pNode = gpWorldLevelData[ iMapIndex ].pTopmostHead;
00431                   while( pNode )
00432                   {
00433                         if( pNode->usIndex == FIRSTPOINTERS1 )
00434                         {
00435                               fAdd = FALSE;
00436                               break;
00437                         }
00438                         pNode = pNode->pNext;
00439                   }
00440                   if( fAdd )
00441                         AddTopmostToTail( iMapIndex, FIRSTPOINTERS1 );
00442             }
00443             curr = curr->next;            
00444       }
00445 }
00446 
00447 void RemoveBuildingLayout()
00448 {
00449       BUILDINGLAYOUTNODE *curr;
00450       INT32 iOffset;
00451       INT32 iMapIndex;
00452       iMapIndex = gSelectRegion.iLeft + gSelectRegion.iTop * WORLD_COLS;
00453       iOffset = iMapIndex - gsBuildingLayoutAnchorGridNo;
00454       curr = gpBuildingLayoutList;
00455       while( curr )
00456       {
00457             iMapIndex = curr->sGridNo + iOffset;
00458             if( iMapIndex > 0 && iMapIndex < WORLD_MAX )
00459                   RemoveTopmost( iMapIndex, FIRSTPOINTERS1 );
00460             curr = curr->next;            
00461       }
00462 }
